Walkthrough / Quickstart¶

To get the example up and running without any modifications, you can follow this walkthorugh

  1. Follow the setup chapter carefully to setup hardware and firmware carefully.
  2. Open a terminal tool and connect to the border router board via USB.
  3. Send a correct Modbus packet into the the border router. For the Tibbo sensors BP#01 the modbus request (hex) 40 04 01 2C 00 01 FE EE is the correct command to read the temperature. The address = 0x40, the read command = 0x04.

How to observe the output¶

In the serial terminal, observe the response to the modbus request. In figure below, the green lines are modbus request and the purple are responses showing a temperature during test of 24.5-25.0 degree for the Tibbo sensors BP#01
